# SpatialUtils

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SpatialUtils is to provide convenience functions for the summarisation and visualisation of imaging-based spatial transcriptomics data.  

## Installation

You can install the development version of SpatialUtils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SydneyBioX/SpatialUtils")
```
